alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 3:20PM CDT until March 30 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 320 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sherard to near Holly Ridge, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Sunflower around 340 PM CDT. Blaine around 345 PM CDT. Ruleville around 350 PM CDT. Drew around 355 PM CDT. Sunnyside around 400 PM CDT. Minter City around 405 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Schlater and Doddsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
